like-fit.title3: Spread the health promotion message by sharing Like Fit to friends and relatives, plus, receive rewards;

investment_section.title: Calculate multiplication of investments
investment_section.description_1: Use the slider or enter the amount manually in order to trace the dynamics of your investment development, disaggregated by year.
investment_section.description_2: The chart shows the estimated income and investment growth through the bonus tokens and the projected growth in their value. The actual result may be higher. The model is an example of calculation, and should not be considered as a solicitation to acquire tokens.

offer_section.title: What we offer
offer_section.list1_description: Mining game brings fun, entertainment and loyalty to the users, which enables the community to grow in the long term.
offer_section.list2_description: As a crypto currency in the platform, it fastens the exchanges between project owners and people. With the growth of Like2like, people can profit from token increasing prices.
offer_section.list3_description: Like2like offers the cryptocurrency owners the chance to bring their token to its community. Members of the platform financially benefit from this function.

technology_section.title: Our technology
technology_section.description_1: Like2Like delivers a platform based on Blockchain technology to the user obtaining maximum security.
technology_section.description_2: Our strongest tool is CSE30 Blockchain Technology 3.0. The biggest hit from us is our deliverance of Smart Contract and system equipped with AI technology and Business Intelligence for the sack of our stakeholders.

blog_1.title: Like2like:  The system for million-like status
blog_1.description: To meet the need of increasing interaction on social networks for both individuals and businesses, Like2like was born and brought the latest breakthroughs in Social Marketing.

blog_2.title: Like2like - A Breakthrough in Social Marketing
blog_2.description: To meet increasing demand of social network interaction for individuals and businesses, Like2like advent brings new breakthroughs in Social Marketing.

blog_3.title: Facebook squeezes network interactions, Business hustles find the solutions
blog_3.description: Facebook gets stricter to the conversion and interactions, both user and businesses come to Like2like as a solution to minimize the impact of Facebook's policy.

blog_4.title: Like2Like platform public launching
blog_4.description: Like2like platform: the first application to boost interaction and conversion by applying CSE30 technology.

blog_5.title: Blockchain: What is next?
blog_5.description: Following the success of Blockchain 1.0 (BTC) and Blockchain 2.0 (ETH), CSE SG PTE LTD published Blockchain 3.0 (CSE30) and Smart Contract 2.0 after 4 year of research and development.
